concept.title: Convert to Single Path
concept.shortdesc: The option is available on the main popup menu only when more than 1 element is selected.

section.p: Similar to convert to path, this converts multiple selected elements to a single path element in the SVG. Due to multiple elements being selected which could all have different element attributes; the stroke/fill colours are removed, and a default of black stroke and no fill is set.
The menu option becomes available multiple elements are selected on the canvas. This option will convert all elements to a single path.
